Package org.restlet.data

Elements of information handled by a component via a connector.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CharacterSet Character set used to encode characters representations.
ControlData Definition of the purpose of a message between components.
Cookie Cookie received from a user agent.
Cookies Represents the cookies sent by a user agent.
CookieSetting Cookie to set in a user agent.
CookiesReader Cookies reader.
Data Element of information handled by a component via a connector.
Form Submission form containing a list of parameters.
FormReader Submission form reader.
Language Language used in representations.
MediaType The data format of a representation.
Metadata Description of data contained in a resource representation.
Method Method to execute when handling a uniform call.
Parameter Multi-usage parameter.
Preference Metadata preference definition.
Reference Represents a reference to a uniform resource identifier (URI).
Representation Current or intended state of a resource.
RepresentationMetadata Metadata describing a representation.
Status Status to return after handling a uniform call.
Tag Validation tag equivalent to the HTTP entity tag.
 

Class Summary
AbstractRepresentation Abstract resource representation.
DefaultRepresentationMetadata Default representation metadata implementation.
EmptyValue Default empty value implementation.
 

Enum Summary
CharacterSets Enumeration of common character sets.
Languages Language used in representations.
MediaTypes The data format of a representation.
Methods Enumeration of call methods.
Statuses Enumeration of call status.
 

Package org.restlet.data Description

Elements of information handled by a component via a connector.

Since:
1.0
See Also:
REST dissertation by Roy T. Fielding
